abstract: As speculation about a possible sale continues to dog the company, Sara Lee says it has reached a deal to sell its White King and Janola cleaning brands to Symex Holdings of Australia for nearly $50 million.
snippet: As speculation about a possible sale continues to dog the company, Sara Lee says it has reached a deal to sell its White King and Janola cleaning brands to Symex Holdings of Australia for nearly $50 million.
lead_paragraph: Sara Lee announced on Wednesday that it had reached an agreement to sell its White King and Janola cleaning brands to Symex Holdings of Australia for about $50 million.

headline.main: Sara Lee Slims Down Some More
